DamageResistances: Cold, Psychic, Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Ethereal Slip
Traits.Content: The Black Stick Man can move through solid objects as if they werenâ€™t there, allowing it to pass through walls and barriers without being seen.

Traits.Name: Aura of Dread
Traits.Content: Creatures within 30 feet of the Black Stick Man must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Black Stick Man makes three attacks.

Actions.Name: Eerie Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Shadow Bolt
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) damage plus 13 (3d8 psychic damage). The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or have its speed halved until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Evasive Reflex
Actions.Content: The Black Stick Man adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the Black Stick Man must see the attacker.
